data.title: BBC Film makes award-winning feature films
data.meta_description: Firmly established at the forefront of UK film, BBC Film has an ambitious slate featuring many of the most exciting filmmakers working today.
data.text:
BBC Film announces new support for UK producers

The opportunities help support UK producing talent and address under-representation in the UK production sector

Upcoming films

BBC Film productions coming to a screen near you soon...

News

News, awards and TV broadcasts of BBC Film productions

Browse our catalogue

BBC Film have been developing films and talent for over 25 years

About us

Who we are and what we do

New and recent releases

Chuck Chuck Baby

In cinemas 19 July 2024

Helenâs world takes an unexpected turn with the return of Joanne, the object of each otherâs unspoken teenage passions.

Janet Planet

In cinemas 19 July 2024

Debut feature from Pulitzer winning playwright Annie Baker

Hoard

In cinemas 17 May 2024

7 year old Maria and her mother live in their own loving world built on sorting through bins and collecting shiny rubbish. One night, their world falls apart.

Made in England: The Films of Powell and Pressburger

In cinemas 10 May 2024

An exploration of the genius of prolific and influential British filmmaking duo Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger

Silver Haze

In cinemas 29 March 2024

Franky is a nurse obsessed with a thirst for revenge who falls in love with one of her patients, Florence.

The Iron Claw

In cinemas 9 February 2024

The rise and fall of the Von Erich family, a dynasty of wrestlers who made a huge impact on the sport.

The End We Start From

In cinemas 19 January 2024

When an environmental crisis sees London submerged by flood waters, a young family are torn apart in the chaos.

One Life

In cinemas 1 January 2024

The inspirational true story of Sir Nicholas Winton who rescued 669 predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis
